Articles.Content:
Wich Orange Suited Kerbal do you like better?

I like Bob more.
I am a fan of Bob, only because he's a big sissy and i take pity on him. WHERE's JEBEDIAH IN THIS LIST!!!!

Before I didn't care, but at present I'm finding a Level 1 Engineer more useful than a Level 1 Scientist, because I'd gladly pay 5% Science for fixing the wheels or repacking the parachutes. So I pick Bill.
I voted Bob because... Bob.
I like Bob because he's smart. Bill's a dummy. "Bless his heart" as any southerner would say.

Bub becoz hez 3smrt5u nob

hez almos as smrt as mi!!!111

[/sarcasm]

Seriously though, Bob rules!
I like Bob because, well, I'm Bob too.

I am a fan of Bob, only because he's a big sissy and i take pity on him. WHERE's JEBEDIAH IN THIS LIST!!!!

I suspect if Jeb were on the poll, there would be no point to the poll.

I like Bill, I always imagined his "stupidity" in a Daffy Duck sort of way, rather than just outright ignorance more like smart but not clever.

Edited January 14, 2015 by Alshain
Bob simply because i prefer the name "Bob" over "Bill"
Bill. I can relate to the name.
Bob, because I feel bad for him at launch and because of the personality that Felbourn/Bob Fitch gave him in his Project Gateway series.
Quit your complaining and do your damn job Bob!
They've both been removed from my program, since I start with pilots.
I like Bob because he's the smartest of the Kerman brothers.
Bill, because he's all political and stuff. He gets me my FUNding

I am a fan of Bob, only because he's a big sissy and i take pity on him. WHERE's JEBEDIAH IN THIS LIST!!!!

Everyone would always choose Jeb because he is awesome, so that is why I didn't include him.
Bill Kerman.

I choose Bill, because he seems like the guy who knows his stuff, but gets a little nervous at launch time. He's certainly no Jebediah, but he doesn't share Bob's wide-eyed terror 24/7.

Of course, I tend to delete the Big Three at the beginning of my saves now; I find it more fun to give personalities to brand-new kerbals, rather than the same old ones we've had for a while.
Bob. He lived longer.

Bill.

He's the only one of the original three that is still alive in my save.

I like Bob because he's the smartest of the Kerman brothers.

And by Kerman brothers you mean the entire planet.

Edited January 15, 2015 by Janos1986
No preference; I send them places as a pair for their respective benefits

Bob. Because... Science!

And because he's S-M-R-T ... I mean S-M-A-R-T (I'm not really too good with pop culture references.)

(I'm not really too good with pop culture references.)

Homer Simpson would be proud.

bob because in my universe, Bob is on the Ill-fated KIR station and is on a SSTO shuttle docked with it when it's thruster system goes haywire while docking a Majiship-k3 (soyuz), and it enters the atmosphere and starts burning up, while Bob quickly undocks and attempts to manuever far away from the station. when the reentryheating stopped, a piece of the station that survived hit the shuttle, and it exploded, wile Bob quickly ditchedand parachuted to safety. based on true story.

when i was docking my experimetal explorer SSTO shuttle to a smaller station that actually exists in my ksp saves called the IKORS, bob was in it, and the thruster system actually went haywire, and i quickly randomly burned to prevent damageing the station and then turned off RCS. i then realized that the suicide burn had gave me a periapsis of 30 km, and i did not have any LFO. i used the reaction wheels orient the shuttle for entry, and then i realized we would be landing on the ocean. i glided near a island, but then i realized that the electric charge and monoprop ran out and i couldnt keep the nose up, and bob ditched while shuttle crashed into the side of the island.

I like Bill due to the fact that he can fix Jebs mess and keep him flying. He has also done some very crazy adventuring. (spent years in orbit after a hell kraken attack on Duna and messed about with the wreckage for starters)

Also I just don't like Bob for whatever reason...
